content.content: Well, actually I would like your opinion for the issue of airdrop #2 I think it would be good to implement BrightID, Atlantis work starting from there to be eligible since by these means there would be no Bot accounts, nor multi-accounts that would make a more real launch of who is supporting the optimism project
I am not familiar with BrightID but I don’t like the idea of Digital IDs because I rather value my anonymity. That’s what I love about Crypto and what made me join it.
BrightID is a good start but in current form you need to attend a zoom call, show your face, which could be recorded, just to verify which is not ideal approach towards Identity
I agree but so many people can not install bright id to Pc as it is must to install to mobile

I like BrigthID but if this is only for anti-Sybil attacks, we need AttestationStation to work for a few months and we will have our participants. No need for a zoom call, keep your anonymity, no mobile install, on chain and op native.

I think Galaxy OATs is a good and simple way to block Sybil-attack. Because when you connect with galaxy it will ask you for Twitter and Discord and verify with your wallet. BrightID is too difficult to use.

The Optimism team is trying to create SBT for each user. I don’t think they will use KYC when doing this. They will introduce us to WEB 3 using WEB 2 activity, attestation or different authentication options. I trust the Optimism team.
I think it’s an excellent idea✅
Gitcoin passport best solution for the Sybil attack
Galaxy is the easiest and most convenient solution to prevent Sybil attacks
Yes. I like to think so.
Gitcoin passport is a good choice to protect sybil
Yes, Gitcoin passeport seems a very good option !

I donated in Gitcoin, but i didn’t know what Gitcoin passport is. And I missed $GTC airdrop and I don’t know why. It’s hard to understand why i use Optimistic need to use Gitcoin donate website first.
Galxe is good because it has KYC passport. Address with Bright ID also nice, to be verified we have to join conference. This’ll prevent a lot of sybils
Frankly didn’t even think about some of these options – learning a lot by reading   Thanks y’all

I feel a company like Shield would be ideal for this … They have the technology to help sort out sybil attacks and we have partnered with them recently for our new NFT marketplace we are building on Optimism network. SHIELD SECURITY
Ejrv78:  implement BrightID   I like the idea to implement BrightID. Also I suggest to use some online game because bots and multiaccounts will not be able to play the game simultaneously.
I don’t think KYC process is a good idea. A lot of people in crypto don’t like this.
Согласен нужно, а то боты обнаглели
maybe user on Optimism must verify twitter or discord accounts to elgibility airdrop #2
Gitcoin passport might be a better idea to filter sybils because brightID requires a video verification and not so many people are willing to provide their bio information. Just my 2c
NO NO NO! NO BOTS! Only real true people. Glory for UKRAINE!

I disagree with the idea of implementing BrightID and Atlantis work for airdrop #2. I think it would be too restrictive and would limit the number of people who could participate in the airdrop. Additionally, relying on these methods to identify and eliminate bot accounts and multi-accounts may not be entirely effective and could lead to legitimate users being excluded from the airdrop. Overall, I think there are better ways to ensure a fair and legitimate launch of the project.
I like that second route, to verify Twitter and discord handles

https://www.getshield.xyz/Seriously though … Shield API uses cross chain recognition and detects any interaction with malicious contracts or cash mixers to weed out the sybil attacks… Shield Bot Website If you want to take this more seriously then read my comment and take a look at this security provider we work together with. It is clearly a simple answer without anyone having to register their personal information or KYC

BrightID is not the best for bot prevention. Galxe is and has been the best option. BrightID gives this web 2 vibe, and it is also difficult to set up. I have been trying for 2 months now to verify my BrightID but i have not been able to. Use galxe.com it is more efficient

Ejrv78:  Well, actually I would like your opinion for the issue of airdrop #2 I think it would be good to implement BrightID, Atlantis work starting from there to be eligible since by these means there would be no Bot accounts, nor multi-accounts that would make a more real launch of who is supporting the optimism project   In my opinion, options to preserve anonymity are still needed. A BAB token or Galxe-passport might be the best option.
if anyone suggest to use identity verification that person should go and use CEX’es instead of DeFi and DEXes. Crypto is all about anonymity, that’s the basic.
Ejrv78:  BrightID   I’m agree with BrightID verification, for limited  multipl account
Vorontein:  BAB token   What is BAB token? Never heard about it
is really good idea. For sure there are a lot of people who made many wallets to get couple of airdrops,
I’m for gitcoin passport, I’ve had problems with bright id several times
so If not bright, just sth else which could help verify users. For example get score 25pts on gitcoin passport.
All multiaccs must die. Keep using usefull protocols and develop bright future together

Why would OP even do another airdrop to the same people that already hold OP or just dump it? It would make far more sense to airdrop with promising projects that have significant user base to airdrop to their users to drive further awareness and new adoption of OP

I think it could be considered whether the Gitcoin passport a better way to filter out all sybil activities as it doesn’t only include the Bridght ID but also some other aspects like facebook, Gitcoin grants, poap etc. with which a non-sybil account can be evaluated from different aspects.

AttestationStation sounds interesting, though it seems to rely somewhat on user input if I am reading correctly. Do you know whether that has been going on? BrightID is designed specifically for anti-sybil though it still has some growth pains before it will be effective en masse.
Which element within Galxe? The Galxe passport?
thats what I wrote above. If you wanna get airdrop you need to get 25pts on gitcoin.

I would love to see what the team at OP Labs  could do with this type of technology… We have just implemented this as one of our new partners to increase security for our community and would love to see Optimism bring on new partners like this to help with the sybil attackers.  User Wallet Fraud Detection This API flags wallets with irregular patterns that are common among malicious actors. Banks have developed the ability to identify patterns of transactions that allow them to freeze accounts complicit in money laundering. SHIELD analyzes blockchain transaction history to develop its own fraud detection models. SHIELD gives access to input variables useful for predicting scams before they happen. Some variables include:     Fraudulent Behavior Money Laundering    Wallets with abnormal/rapid movement of funds in a short time frame or interacted with a known exploit Wallets sending amounts to an alternative wallet which then sends the same amount an exchange Wallets has created unverified smart contracts  User Tornado Cash Compliance Monitor your user base for malicious or irregular transaction history This library detects wallets that have interacted with sanctioned protocols such as Tornado Cash. We also scan for “burner wallets” used to obfuscate illegitimate transfers and a growing range of indicators for malicious actors. The U.S. Treasury Department’s Office of Foreign Assets Control sanctioned Tornado Cash on August 8th, 2022.  Transaction Verification and Simulation Simulate expected outcome of any blockchain transaction Shield also serves as a robust data provider for bad actor reputational data and enables protocols and infra projects to identify patterns of users that engage in malicious activity.  image1372×1252 199 KB  WHAT IS BETTER THAN GUILD ???  GUILD + SHIELD    DON’T Have anomalous transaction patterns   DON’T Have a history of creating unverified contracts   DON’T Have interactions with known exploits   DON’T Have frequent indirect exchange deposits   DON’T Have direct interactions with Tornado Cash    image1935×1284 141 KB

I Don’t Like Gitcoin Passport 3 days ago, January 31st. Gitcoin remind me to donate their grants. I tried, but it’s so hard to use. There is a lot of task i should redo (Which I have done months ago) Reconnect Twitter gains 2 points. Reconnect Discord gains 1 points. And so on. The website designed like 1990s. It cost me over 10 hours to wait the button ‘verifying’ become ‘save’ Use Gitcoin Pass? Next Life, this website is too stupid.
Maybe only with GALAXY PASSPORT I suppose.

I totally agree with you. In order to have a good score you have to doxx yourself, which is the opposite of the vision of people in crypto. We all should be equal with rewards if we met the same requirements. There is a lot of way to provide sybils. And secondly, the site is very slow. Buttons are broken and nothing works when you want to verify an asset.
Yes, I never used any product stupid like this. And I need to finish almost all of the tasks so that I can donate. Ridiculous.

Gitcoin is overwhelmed with airdrop hunters. Every twitter account tweeting which grants to fund so I’d definitely drop gitcoin users from the airdrop as it’s 90% airdrop hunters. Bright ID is a no go for majority of crypto users. Just my2cents.
i think its a good idea imo Proud to be part of the Optimism Collective!
I think as long as there are slightly stricter regulations and deep participation in ecological governance, witches should be prevented
Great advice! i definitely agree
People can’t even get 21 points on gitcoin talk mote of 25
BridghtID seems like a bad idea for me. Remember figment acitivites back in the days when same guys verified like 5-10 accs just showing themselves, not an option.
BAB token - Binance Account Bound Token. One account - one person.
In theory this is a good option against bots and multi-accounts But still many people want to remain anonymous, so I think we should consider other options

Allowing third parties to collect personal data in the form of a BAB token or Galxy passport is the last thing in a decentralized community. Is not it so?  Gitcoin passport would probably be a good option if it functioned well. In my opinion, the mechanism has not been completed yet. There is confusion with the trust bonus, the linking of the github account and the constant unlinking of profiles. Bright ID, as indicated above, requires the presence on zoom call, which is also quite strange and indicates that the technology is crude.

You could also use guild with a number of different integrations that are readily available to cross verify or 2FA with multiple requirements including github or twitter to access a private server and then give the google docs token gated access to those who pass the cross app integration gateway and continue to fill out the private form with designated wallet address to the submission for a proper safety procedure … Then on top of that you could also pull the wallet addresses of those who have completed the form straight from the guild database and distribution of BAB could be done on a much more private level so there is no risk of personal information being shared without permission. Plus the Attestation Station is also integrated with guild from OP Labs which is coming into play with the structure of the Optimism discord and token gated channels for designated members of the governance. Building an attestation station also provides a great way to verify the authenticity of the user. We have recently opened a discussion about this and would love for members here to give additional feedback.    Active 3rd party Attestations       Hey @Urban_Raccoon …  We are starting out with simple Q & A on this tooling we are adding to our marketplace.  If you or other members of the governance forum would like to help us gather resources by giving feedback on the questions we have posted that would be amazing. We are dedicated to making a very high quality experience with our UI/UX developer because he is an absolute creative genius !  Here is a link to our research & development forum for product development.  Fractal Visions Peeranh…    Screen Shot 2023-02-08 at 6.03.55 PM932×768 42 KB

I hate gitcoin now! It is putting the baggage on loyal users. Instead of supporting , they are becoming autocratic and  has changed a lot, well they are not there without their early adopters. If optimism can think and create a project similar to Gitcoin, I am definitely moving over!
I am suggesting a pfp OP exclusive mark or something like SBT that can be seen in any social media or blogs - only for loyal OP something like the Diamond Roles given to Openchat early users of ICP.
